# Data 605 discussion week 14 #8.8.25

Exercises 25 ¡V 30, use the Taylor series given in Key Idea 32 to create the Taylor series of the given func??ons.

## 25. 
$f(x) = cos (x^2)$


Key Idea 32 informs us that:

$cos(x) = \sum_{\infty }^{n=0}(-1)^{n}\frac{x^{2n}}{(2n)!}$

$= 1 - \frac{x^2}{2!} + \frac{x^4}{4!} - \frac{x^6}{6!} + ....$

$cos(x^2) = \sum_{\infty }^{n=0}(-1)^{n}\frac{(x^2)^{2n}}{(2n)!}$

$= 1 - \frac{x^4}{2!} + \frac{x^8}{4!} - \frac{x^12}{6!} + ....$
